Class GameLogic

java.lang.Object
com.example.GameLogic
public class GameLogic extends Object
The brain of the game, handling all the logic

      players - - list of players
      tiles - - list of tiles
      bonusTiles - - list of bonus tiles
      dice - - list of dices
      boardSize - - size of the board
      currentPlayer - - the current player
      turn - - the current turn
